page.title: 20A TEENAGER'S VIEWPOINT.
page.content: " FORTON BEING A SMALL VILLAGE, HAS NOTHING FOR TEENAGE INTEREST. THERE ARE NO SHOPS OR LITTLE STORES, SO NO FOOD DRINK OR BITS AND PIECES CAN BE BOUGHT. IT IS ONLY TWO MILES TO NEWPORT, BUT WITHOUT TRANSPORT IT IS A LONG DISTANCE. THE ONLY ENTERTAINMENT IS FORTON LODGE, THE DISCOTEQUE WHICH IS FOR OVER 18's. NEXT TO THE LODGE THERE IS THE OLD SWAN INN, BUT ONCE AGAIN NOT FOR MY AGE GROUP. THERE ARE NOT ENOUGH CHILDREN TO FORM A YOUTH CLUB, THERE ARE 18 IN ALL, 5 OF WHO ARE UNDER THE AGE OF TEN. TO ME, I FIND FORTON IS BORING AND INCONVENIENT FOR MY PARENTS, WHO HAVE TO TAKE ME ANYWHERE I WANT TO GO."
